verses.verse: But it happened that when <S%H5571>Sanballat<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> that we were <S%H1129>building<s%> the <S%H2346>wall,<s%> he was <S%H2734>angry,<s%> and took <S%H7235>great<s%> <S%H3707>indignation,<s%> and <S%H3932>mocked<s%> the <S%H3064>Jews.<s%>

He <S%H559>spoke<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> his <S%H251>brothers<s%> and the <S%H2428>army<s%> of <S%H8111>Samaria,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "What are these <S%H537>feeble<s%> <S%H3064>Jews<s%> <S%H6213>doing?<s%> Will they <S%H5800>fortify<s%> <S%H2076>themselves?<s%> Will they sacrifice? Will they <S%H3615>finish<s%> in a <S%H3117>day?<s%> Will they <S%H2421>revive<s%> the <S%H68>stones<s%> out of the <S%H6194>heaps<s%> of <S%H6083>rubbish,<s%> since they are <S%H8313>burned?<s%>"

Now <S%H2900>Tobiah<s%> the <S%H5984>Ammonite<s%> was by <S%H681>him,<s%> and he <S%H559>said,<s%> "What they are <S%H1129>building,<s%> if a <S%H7776>fox<s%> climbed <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H6555>it,<s%> he would break down their <S%H68>stone<s%> <S%H2346>wall.<s%>"

<S%H8085>"Hear,<s%> our <S%H430>God;<s%> for we are <S%H939>despised;<s%> and <S%H7725>turn<s%> back their <S%H2781>reproach<s%> on their own <S%H7218>head,<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> them up for a <S%H961>spoil<s%> in a <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H7633>captivity;<s%>

<S%H3680>don't<s%> cover their <S%H5771>iniquity,<s%> and <S%H2403>don't<s%> let their sin be blotted <S%H4229>out<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3707>you;<s%> for they have insulted the <S%H1129>builders.<s%>"

So we <S%H1129>built<s%> the <S%H2346>wall;<s%> and all the <S%H2346>wall<s%> was joined <S%H7194>together<s%> to <S%H2677>half<s%> its <S%H5971>height:<s%> for the people had a <S%H3820>mind<s%> to <S%H6213>work.<s%>

But it happened that when <S%H5571>Sanballat,<s%> <S%H2900>Tobiah,<s%> the <S%H6163>Arabians,<s%> the <S%H5984>Ammonites,<s%> and the <S%H796>Ashdodites<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> that the repairing of the <S%H2346>walls<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> went <S%H724>forward,<s%> and that the <S%H6555>breaches<s%> <S%H2490>began<s%> to be <S%H5640>filled,<s%> then they were <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H2734>angry;<s%>
and they <S%H7194>conspired<s%> all of them <S%H3162>together<s%> to <S%H935>come<s%> and <S%H3898>fight<s%> against <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and to cause confusion <S%H6213>therein.<s%>
But we made our <S%H6419>prayer<s%> to our <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H5975>set<s%> a <S%H4929>watch<s%> against them <S%H3119>day<s%> and <S%H3915>night,<s%> because of <S%H6440>them.<s%>

<S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "The <S%H3581>strength<s%> of the bearers of <S%H5449>burdens<s%> is <S%H3782>fading,<s%> and there is <S%H7235>much<s%> <S%H6083>rubbish;<s%> so that we are not <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H1129>build<s%> the <S%H2346>wall.<s%>"

Our <S%H6862>adversaries<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "They shall not <S%H3045>know,<s%> neither <S%H7200>see,<s%> until we <S%H935>come<s%> into <S%H8432>their<s%> <S%H8432>midst,<s%> and <S%H2026>kill<s%> <S%H4399>them,<s%> and cause the work to <S%H7673>cease.<s%>"

It happened that when the <S%H3064>Jews<s%> who <S%H3427>lived<s%> by <S%H681>them<s%> <S%H935>came,<s%> they <S%H559>said<s%> to us <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H6471>times<s%> from all <S%H4725>places,<s%> "Wherever you <S%H7725>turn,<s%> they will attack us."

Therefore <S%H5975>set<s%> I in the <S%H8482>lowest<s%> <S%H4725>parts<s%> of the space <S%H310>behind<s%> the <S%H2346>wall,<s%> in the open <S%H6706>places,<s%> I <S%H5975>set<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> after their <S%H4940>families<s%> with their <S%H2719>swords,<s%> their <S%H7420>spears,<s%> and their <S%H7198>bows.<s%>

I <S%H7200>looked,<s%> and rose <S%H6965>up,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H2715>nobles,<s%> and to the <S%H5461>rulers,<s%> and to the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H3372>"Don't<s%> be afraid of <S%H6440>them!<s%> <S%H2142>Remember<s%> the <S%H136>Lord,<s%> who is <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H3372>awesome,<s%> and <S%H3898>fight<s%> for your <S%H251>brothers,<s%> your <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and your <S%H1323>daughters,<s%> your <S%H802>wives,<s%> and your <S%H1004>houses.<s%>"

It <S%H341>happened,<s%> when our enemies <S%H8085>heard<s%> that it was <S%H3045>known<s%> to <S%H430>us,<s%> and God had <S%H6565>brought<s%> their <S%H6098>counsel<s%> to <S%H6565>nothing,<s%> that we <S%H7725>returned<s%> all of us to the <S%H2346>wall,<s%> <S%H376>everyone<s%> to his <S%H4399>work.<s%>

It happened from that <S%H3117>time<s%> <S%H2677>forth,<s%> that half of my <S%H5288>servants<s%> <S%H6213>worked<s%> in the <S%H4399>work,<s%> and <S%H2677>half<s%> of them <S%H2388>held<s%> the <S%H7420>spears,<s%> the <S%H4043>shields,<s%> and the <S%H7198>bows,<s%> and the <S%H8302>coats<s%> of <S%H8269>mail;<s%> and the rulers were <S%H310>behind<s%> all the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>

They all <S%H1129>built<s%> the <S%H2346>wall<s%> and those who <S%H5375>bore<s%> <S%H5447>burdens<s%> <S%H6006>loaded<s%> <S%H259>themselves;<s%> everyone with one of his <S%H3027>hands<s%> <S%H6213>worked<s%> in the <S%H4399>work,<s%> and with the <S%H259>other<s%> <S%H2388>held<s%> his <S%H7973>weapon;<s%>

and the <S%H1129>builders,<s%> <S%H376>everyone<s%> <S%H631>wore<s%> his <S%H2719>sword<s%> at his <S%H4975>side,<s%> and so <S%H1129>built.<s%> He who <S%H8628>sounded<s%> the <S%H7782>trumpet<s%> was by <S%H681>me.<s%>

I <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H2715>nobles,<s%> and to the <S%H5461>rulers<s%> and to the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of the <S%H5971>people,<s%> "The <S%H4399>work<s%> is <S%H7235>great<s%> and <S%H7235>large,<s%> and we are <S%H6504>separated<s%> on the <S%H2346>wall,<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> far <S%H7350>from<s%> <S%H251>another.<s%>
<S%H4725>Wherever<s%> you <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of the <S%H7782>trumpet,<s%> <S%H6908>rally<s%> there to <S%H430>us.<s%> Our God will fight for <S%H3898>us.<s%>"

So we <S%H6213>worked<s%> in the <S%H4399>work:<s%> and <S%H2677>half<s%> of them <S%H2388>held<s%> the <S%H7420>spears<s%> from the <S%H5927>rising<s%> of the <S%H7837>morning<s%> until the <S%H3556>stars<s%> <S%H3318>appeared.<s%>

Likewise at the same <S%H6256>time<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> I to the <S%H5971>people,<s%> "Let <S%H376>everyone<s%> with his <S%H5288>servant<s%> <S%H3885>lodge<s%> <S%H8432>within<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> that in the <S%H3915>night<s%> they may be a <S%H4929>guard<s%> to <S%H4399>us,<s%> and may labor in the <S%H3117>day.<s%>"

So neither <S%H251>I,<s%> nor my brothers, nor my <S%H5288>servants,<s%> nor the <S%H582>men<s%> of the <S%H4929>guard<s%> who <S%H310>followed<s%> <S%H587>me,<s%> none of us took <S%H6584>off<s%> our <S%H899>clothes.<s%> <S%H376>Everyone<s%> took his <S%H7973>weapon<s%> to the <S%H4325>water.<s%>
